title: [Self-Directed] Scaffolding Strategies for Mathematical Problem-Solving for Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental arithmetic operations and simple equation comprehension
context.additional_context: Provides scaffolded step-by-step support to systematically solve mathematical problems encountered by professionals. Ensures accessibility through smartphone-based learning

learning_goals: Learners can decompose complex work problems into three or more stages and solve them sequentially
Learners can solve problems with 80% or higher accuracy in environments where instructor support gradually decreases
Learners can design mathematical models suitable for real-world work scenarios through project-based assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
